Class jmines.view.components.GamePanel extends JPanel implements Serializable

serialVersionUID: -2965820654953600202L

Serialized Fields

gameBoard

GameBoard gameBoard
The object who is in charge of all the business calculations.

tilesWidth

int tilesWidth
The width (in pixels) of a tile.

tilesHeight

int tilesHeight
The height (in pixels) of a tile.

buffer

BufferedImage buffer
The buffer in which the panel is first painted.

backgroundBuffer

BufferedImage backgroundBuffer
The buffer in which the panel background is first painted.

bufferGraphics

Graphics2D bufferGraphics
The graphics of the panel buffer.

backgroundBufferGraphics

Graphics2D backgroundBufferGraphics
The graphics of the panel background buffer.

mainPanel

MainPanel mainPanel
The JMines main panel.

currentlyPressed

Collection<E> currentlyPressed
The set of currently pressed buttons.
Each point contained in this collection correspond to a tile: The x coordinate is the number of the column containing the tile, and the y coordinate is the number of the line containing the tile.

currentlyOverflown

Point currentlyOverflown
The currently overflown button.
The x coordinate is the number of the column containing the tile, and the y coordinate is the number of the line containing the tile.

mouseListener

MouseListenerForGamePanel mouseListener
The object who listen the mouse events.

difficulty

String difficulty
The current difficulty (Configuration.DIFFICULTY_BEGINNER, Configuration.DIFFICULTY_INTERMEDIATE, Configuration.DIFFICULTY_EXPERT or Configuration.DIFFICULTY_CUSTOM).

lost

boolean lost
Tell whether or not the game has been lost.

won

boolean won
Tell whether or not the game has been won.

defeatTile

Tile defeatTile
The clicked tile that is responsible of the defeat.

buttonsColor

Color buttonsColor
The color of the buttons.

transparency

int transparency
The transparency ratio for the highlighted and unlighted parts of the buttons.

brighter

Color brighter
The "mask" to apply to the highlighted part of the buttons.

darker

Color darker
The "mask" to apply to the unlighted part of the buttons.

lookAndFeelDependentButtonsColor

Color lookAndFeelDependentButtonsColor
The look and feel dependent color of the buttons.

colored

boolean colored
Tell whether or not the game panel is painted with colors or with gray scales.

antialiased

boolean antialiased
Tell whether or not the display is antialiased.

shadowed

boolean shadowed
Tell whether or not a "shadow" has to follow the cursor.
